about_the_game: The soundtrack for Medieval Kingdom Wars captures the drama, danger, and diplomacy of the Hundred Years' War across seventeen tracks. Composer Joel Steudler summons the spirit of the era through period-appropriate instruments mixed with powerful orchestral punch. Crumhorns, recorders, and the Viola da Gamba (played by Isabel Esain) evoke the sound of ancient times when kings and knights shaped the world. Melodic themes and thundering drums will carry you into an action packed listening experience!
